From: Bhumi Saxena <bhumi.saxena@techneplus.com>

CC: 
BCC: 
Date: 2024-11-18 12:14
Subject: Follow-up | TechnePlus Continue Discussion
--------------------------------------------------
CAUTION: This email originated from outside of the organization. Do not click links or open attachments unless you recognize the sender and know the content is safe. 
تم إرسال هذا البريد الإلكتروني من خارج مجموعة شلهوب. لا تنقر على الروابط أو تفتح المرفقات إلا إذا كنت تعرف المرسل وتعلم أنه آمن


Hi Hagop,

We have experience working with global clients, leveraging Data, Boomi and Hyper Automation to solve for various business problems and priorities. I have shared brief email previous back to discuss with some specific use case.

Some of the examples at high level includes:

*	Data: Dynamic pricing, Berth utilization and planning, Sales forecasting, BI and dashboards etc.
*	BOOMI Integration: integration between legacy systems and with third party (vendors) systems etc.
*	HyperAutomation: Automated invoice generation, processing, Pricing platform and automation etc.

 

Would like to know your area of interest and we will include more use cases to discuss on call.

 

I hope you receive your availability for the week!

 

Thanks

Bhumi

From: Bhumi Saxena 
Sent: 06 November 2024 19:18

Subject: RE: RE: RE: Available Time Slots | TechnePlus Continue Discussion

 

Hi Hagop,

I would appreciate it, if you could share your availability to showcase our capabilities and to discuss this further?

 

Do you have some availability for Wednesday or upcoming week.

 

Looking forward to hear from you!

 

Thanks,

Bhumi

________________________________

From: Bhumi Saxena 
Sent: 04 October 2024 15:45
To: hagop.ghazarian@chalhoub.com
Subject: RE: Available Time Slots: TechnePlus Continue Discussion

 

Hi Hagop,

I tried to call you but couldn’t make it for a short discussion about, how we help our Fortune 500 Clients leverage the capabilities of Boomi & Hyper Automation to transform your application development processes. 

 

We realize our vision of Connected Systems, People, and Processes efficiently, empowering you to achieve new levels of excellence by combining our deep industry knowledge with the capabilities of Boomi. Our Integration Centre of Excellence (COE) is built on extensive experience and a solid foundation in best practices, allowing us to partner strategically with Boomi to deliver tangible business value.

We realize our vision of Connected Systems, People, and Processes efficiently, empowering you to achieve new levels of excellence by combining our deep industry knowledge with the capabilities of Boomi. Our Integration Centre of Excellence (COE) is built on extensive experience and a solid foundation in best practices, allowing us to partner strategically with Boomi to deliver tangible business value. 

 

I would be happy to discuss how TechnePlus and Boomi can transform your operations and enhance the experience. Please let me know a convenient time for us to connect, or feel free to reach out directly. 

I’d love to connect and explore how we can work together. What does your schedule look like next week?   

Cheers,

Bhumi
